v0.1.2.Description: This update is all about the ease of use. We have added a few new features and changed a few pre-existing ones to make the application easire to use.
Changelog-added: Page list functionality added to navigation

v0.1.1.Title: The accounts update
v0.1.1.Description: In this update we have added the functionality of accounts. You can now create accounts (With a reference code), login and log out.

v0.1.0.Title: MILG0IR home
v0.1.0.Description: Welcome to MILG0IR home! We are working to create the best media organizer around! With a simple and easy to use user interface, it is unbeatable!
